competitors.name: Microsoft Azure AD
competitors.notes: Primary competitor leveraging Microsoft ecosystem integration

competitors.name: Ping Identity
competitors.notes: Enterprise identity management with on-premises strength

competitors.name: OneLogin
competitors.notes: Cloud-based IAM for enterprises and SMBs

competitors.name: Auth0
competitors.notes: Developer-focused identity platform, Okta announced acquisition in 2021

context: Okta, Inc. is a identity and access management company focused on workforce identity, customer identity, and privileged access. Remote work drove identity demand. Acquired Auth0.
